## Look up Existing NotifyRoutes Resource {#look-up}

Get an existing NotifyRoutes resource's state with the given name, ID, and optional extra properties used to qualify the lookup.
<div>
<pulumi-chooser type="language" options="typescript,python,go,csharp,java,yaml"></pulumi-chooser>
